name: Perpetual Heart
description: The core that powers the autonomous movements of the Perpetual MechanicalArray.  Some theorize that the symbols on these cores have knowledge and logicinscribed upon them in a language that eyes cannot perceive. Some go a stepfurther and believe that these unique Ruin machines autonomously decided toforsake a biomimetic form to pursue strength of function on account of theirespecially large cores and complex inscriptions.
